attributes.action: throw out any possible motion to add the Welsh dragon to the Union Flag.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The MP for Wrexham has raised the idea that the Welsh dragon should be added to the Union Flag in order to reflect Wales' status as a member of the UK. Although I respect the Welsh, and I do believe we should be aiming towards a "British" identity, I do not think that this is the best way of promoting this. 
Our flag is symbolic of our national history, and I believe that it is something that we should not make alterations too, unless there is significant change in the state of the Union. As it stands, Scotland and England are still the United Kingdoms, while Wales is a principality.
